testcase.name: whenUsingTheSpyAnnotation_thenObjectIsSpied
testcase.failure: org.mockito.exceptions.misusing.NotAMockException: Argument passed to verify() is of type ArrayList and is not a mock! Make sure you place the parenthesis correctly!
